short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve how you watch images on 4chan. Add a gallery, slideshow, grid mode, and a button to expand all images to 4channel threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: this extension has a generous free trial. After the trial you'll be asked to buy a license key.

This extensions greatly improves how you watch images on 4chan and 4channel. It adds a grid view, image gallery with slideshow mode, and a button to expand all images.

The image grid view shows all images of a thread in a grid. Grid mode is perfect for scrolling through all images of a thread.

Gallery mode shows a single image in full-screen. Gallery mode looks identical to opening the image in a new tab. Keyboard shortcuts can be used to navigate between images.

Expand all images expands all images in the thread, the same way clicking an image normally would do.

Settings are available to customize almost every aspect of this extension.
